name: @switchboard-xyz/common
description: common type definitions and utils for interacting with switchboard

scripts.build:old: npm run build:protos && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs:protos: shx rm -rf lib/cjs/protos; shx mkdir -p lib/cjs/protos; pbjs --root sbv2Protos -t static-module -o lib/cjs/protos/index.js ./protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/cjs/protos/index.d.ts lib/cjs/protos/index.js
scripts.build:esm:protos: shx rm -rf lib/esm/protos; shx mkdir -p lib/esm/protos; pbjs --root sbv2Protos -t static-module --es6 -w "es6" -o lib/esm/protos/index.js ./protos/*.proto && pbts -o lib/esm/protos/index.d.ts lib/esm/protos/index.js && shx --silent sed  -i 'protobufjs/minimal' 'protobufjs/minimal.js' lib/esm/protos/index.js > '/dev/null' 2>&1 && shx --silent sed -i 'import \* as' 'import' lib/esm/protos/index.js > '/dev/null' 2>&1
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm version patch
